summary.span: 为定位和编辑 XML 数据提供游标模型。

span.span: Provides a cursor model for navigating and editing XML data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类命名空间是一个抽象类，它定义用于导航和编辑为 XQuery 1.0 和 XPath 2.0 数据模型的实例的 XML 信息项的游标模型。The class in the namespace is an abstract class which defines a cursor model for navigating and editing XML information items as instances of the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model. 对象创建一个类以实现从如和类。An object is created from a class that implements the interface such as the and classes. 创建的对象对象为只读时创建的对象对象可以进行编辑。 objects created by objects are read-only while objects created by objects can be edited. 使用确定对象的只读或可编辑状态属性类。An object's read-only or editable status is determined using the property of the class. 有关处理使用 XPath 数据模型的 XML 数据的详细信息，请参阅[使用 XPath 数据模型处理 XML 数据](~/docs/standard/data/xml/process-xml-data-using-the-xpath-data-model.md)主题。For more information about processing XML data using the XPath data model, see the [Process XML Data Using the XPath Data Model](~/docs/standard/data/xml/process-xml-data-using-the-xpath-data-model.md) topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于使用而引发的异常类，如类中，可能包含不应在不受信任的方案中公开的敏感信息。Exceptions raised as a result of using the class, such as the class, may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 应正确处理异常，以便在不受信任的情况下不公开此敏感信息。Exceptions should be properly handled so that this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios.

summary.span: 返回一个 对象，该对象用于在当前节点的子节点列表的末尾创建一个或多个新的子节点。

span.span: Returns an object used to create one or more new child nodes at the end of the list of child nodes of the current node.

returns.span: 一个 对象，该对象用于在当前节点的子节点列表的末尾创建新的子节点。

span.span: An object used to create new child nodes at the end of the list of child nodes of the current node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追加子节点的操作会将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的末尾。Appending child nodes adds the new nodes to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果的元素有三个子节点，则第一个追加的节点将成为第四个子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the first appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果不存在任何子节点，然后创建新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 新的子节点不会插入直到方法调用对象。The new child node is not inserted until the method of the object is called. - 方法是仅当定位在根节点或元素节点。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . 你可以将多个节点写入编写器。You can write more than one node to the writer. 所有节点将都追加到当前节点的子节点列表的末尾。All nodes are appended to the end of the list of child nodes of the current node. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，新`pages`子元素追加到的子元素的第一个列表`book`中的元素`contosoBooks.xml`文件使用从返回的对象方法。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object returned from the method. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追加的子节点的操作会将新节点添加到的当前节点的子节点列表的末尾。Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果的元素有三个子节点，则追加的节点将成为第四个子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果不存在任何子节点，然后创建新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 若要创建一个新元素节点，请在 XML 字符串参数中包括所有的 XML 语法。To create a new element node, include all XML syntax in the XML string parameter. 一个新的字符串`book`节点是`AppendChild("")`。The string for a new `book` node is `AppendChild("")`. 将文本"book"追加到当前节点的文本节点的字符串是`AppendChild("book")`。The string for appending the text "book" to the current node's text node is `AppendChild("book")`. 如果 XML 字符串包含多个节点，将添加所有节点。If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 方法是仅当定位在根节点或元素节点。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中，在 `pages` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的子元素列表上追加新的 `contosoBooks.xml` 子元素。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 追加的子节点的操作会将新节点添加到的当前节点的子节点列表的末尾。Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果的元素有三个子节点，则追加的节点将成为第四个子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果不存在任何子节点，然后创建新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果对象是否定位在 XML 节点的序列，将添加序列中的所有节点。If the object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added. - 方法是仅当定位在根节点或元素节点。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，新`pages`子元素追加到的子元素的第一个列表`book`中的元素`contosoBooks.xml`文件使用指定对象。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object specified. `http://www.contoso.com/books` ，以便使用相同的命名空间与 XML 文档追加新的子元素指定命名空间。The `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace is specified so that the new child element is appended using the same namespace as the XML document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 追加的子节点的操作会将新节点添加到的当前节点的子节点列表的末尾。Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果三个子节点有一个元素节点，则追加的节点将成为第四个子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element node, the appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果不存在任何子节点，然后创建新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 可以通过获取 Namespace 前缀和 URI 值方法或方法。Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained by using the method or the method. 例如，以下语法使用范围内命名空间的追加的子元素`xmlns:bk=http://www.contoso.com/books`:For example, the following syntax appends a child element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk=http://www.contoso.com/books`: ``` navigator.AppendChildElement(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` 这将创建新的子``元素。This creates the new child `` element. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果指定的命名空间前缀是`null`或，然后从当前命名空间范围内获取的命名空间 URI 的新元素的前缀。If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or , then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果没有分配给指定的命名空间 URI 在当前范围内命名空间前缀，则会自动生成的命名空间前缀。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated. - 方法是仅当定位在根节点或元素节点。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中，在 `pages` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的子元素列表上追加新的 `contosoBooks.xml` 子元素。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 联网的 XML 文档的数据，聚合使用各种 W3C 标准包含机制，块组成，因此包含来自不同位置的节点。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data, aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms, and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. DTD 实体是一个示例演示此聚合的数据，但不限于 Dtd。DTD entities are an example of this aggregated data, but it is not limited to DTDs. 属性告知你这些节点源自。The property tells you where these nodes originate from. 例如，如果 XML 数据加载从http://server/mydata.xml、属性返回http://server/mydata.xml。For example, if the XML data is loaded from http://server/mydata.xml, the property returns http://server/mydata.xml. > [!NOTE] > 使用创建的节点类具有相同作为 XML 文档从已创建。Nodes created using the class have the same as the XML document the was created from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 方法验证 XML 数据中包含符合全局类型或声明中或多个架构中提供。The method verifies that the XML data contained in the conforms to a global type or declaration in the schema or schemas provided in the . - 方法不执行信息集增加。The method does not perform infoset augmentation. 这意味着，架构的默认值不会应用中，文本值不会转换为原子值，而不与信息项关联的任何新的类型信息。This means that schema defaults are not applied, text values are not converted to atomic values, and no new type information is associated with information items. - 架构`xsi:schemaLocation`或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`的 XML 数据中的提示将被忽略。Schema `xsi:schemaLocation` or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` hints in the XML data of are ignored. - 如果定位在文档节点上，则验证过程包括唯一性和引用约束的检查 (`xs:ID`， `xs:IDREF`， `xs:key`， `xs:keyref`，和`xs:unique`)。If the is positioned on a document node, the validation process includes checking of uniqueness and reference constraints (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, and `xs:unique`). 否则，将忽略这些检查。Otherwise, these checks are omitted. - 如果参数原样传递`null`和定位在元素节点上，通过公开的类型信息属性的属性用于检查节点的有效性。If the passed as a parameter is `null` and the is positioned on an element node, the type information exposed by the property's property is used to check the node's validity. 如果参数原样传递`null`和位于根节点中，使用的文档元素 （即，子元素的根节点） 属性。If the passed as a parameter is `null` and the is positioned on the root node, the property of the document element (that is, the element child of the root node) is used. 在这两种情况下如果元素的属性属性是`null`和参数原样传递`null`、之所以引发因为用于执行无类型信息验证。In both cases if the property of the element's property is `null` and the passed as a parameter is `null`, an is thrown because there is no type information to use to perform validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Namespace 前缀和 URI 值可以通过获取或方法。Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained using the or method. 例如，以下语法创建属性使用范围内命名空间`xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`:For example, the following syntax creates an attribute by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ``` editor.CreateAttribute(navigator.Prefix, "attributeName", LookupNamespace(navigator.Prefix), "text") ``` 这将创建新属性``上的当前元素。This creates the new attribute `` on the current element. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果指定的命名空间前缀是或`null`，从当前命名空间范围内获取的前缀的命名空间 URI 的新属性。If the namespace prefix specified is or `null`, the prefix for the namespace URI of the new attribute is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果没有分配给指定的命名空间 URI 在当前范围内命名空间前缀，将自动生成的命名空间前缀。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, a namespace prefix is automatically generated. 例如，若要创建新的属性上的默认命名空间中的某个元素`contosoBooks.xml`文件，(`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`)，你指定`null`或命名空间前缀和命名空间 URI 参数。For example to create a new attribute on an element in the default namespace of the `contosoBooks.xml` file, (`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`), you specify `null` or for both the namespace prefix and namespace URI parameters. 指定`http://www.contoso.com/books`的命名空间 URI 作为参数将导致方法为自动生成新属性的命名空间前缀。Specifying `http://www.contoso.com/books` as the namespace URI parameter will cause the method to auto generate a namespace prefix for the new attribute. - 如果创建的新属性是与冲突的元素的命名空间声明或者因为另一个命名空间声明在同一范围内，使用选择的命名空间前缀的命名空间节点，或是因为选择该前缀是相同的元素，但较绑定到不同的命名空间 URI，将引发异常。If the new attribute created is a namespace node which conflicts with a namespace declaration on the element, either because the namespace prefix chosen is used by another namespace declaration at the same scope, or because the prefix chosen is the same as that of the element but is bound to a different namespace URI, an exception is thrown. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，新`discount`上创建属性`price`的第一个子元素`book`中的元素`contosoBooks.xml`文件。In the following example, a new `discount` attribute is created on the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 当定位在元素上，通过创建新属性方法将被置于当前元素的属性列表的末尾。When the is positioned on an element, the new attributes created by the method are placed at the end of the attribute list of the current element. - 新的属性不会插入直到方法调用对象。The new attributes are not inserted until the method of the object is called. - 如果指定的命名空间前缀是或`null`，从当前命名空间范围内获取的前缀的命名空间 URI 的新属性。If the namespace prefix specified is or `null`, the prefix for the namespace URI of the new attribute is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果没有分配给指定的命名空间 URI 在当前范围内命名空间前缀，将自动生成的命名空间前缀。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, a namespace prefix is automatically generated. 例如，若要创建新的属性上的默认命名空间中的某个元素`contosoBooks.xml`文件，(`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`)，你指定`null`或命名空间前缀和命名空间 URI 参数。For example to create a new attribute on an element in the default namespace of the `contosoBooks.xml` file, (`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`), you specify `null` or for both the namespace prefix and namespace URI parameters. 指定`http://www.contoso.com/books`的命名空间 URI 作为参数将导致方法为自动生成新属性的命名空间前缀。Specifying `http://www.contoso.com/books` as the namespace URI parameter will cause the method to auto generate a namespace prefix for the new attribute. - 如果创建的新属性是与冲突的元素的命名空间声明或者因为另一个命名空间声明在同一范围内，使用选择的命名空间前缀的命名空间节点，或是因为选择该前缀是相同的元素，但较绑定到不同的命名空间 URI，将引发异常。If the new attribute created is a namespace node which conflicts with a namespace declaration on the element, either because the namespace prefix chosen is used by another namespace declaration at the same scope, or because the prefix chosen is the same as that of the element but is bound to a different namespace URI, an exception is thrown. - 返回对象仅可用于创建属性。The object returned may only be used to create attributes. 调用其他不创建属性的对象方法将引发异常。Calling other object methods that do not create attributes throws an exception. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中，使用从 `discount` 方法返回的 `currency` 对象在 `price` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的 `contosoBooks.xml` 子元素上创建新的 和 属性。In the following example, new `discount` and `currency` attributes are created on the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object returned from the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks - 位于所删除的节点的父节点上成功删除。The is positioned on the deleted node's parent node on successful deletion. - 如果已删除的节点是一个文本节点，这是简单类型化元素的内容，该元素会失去其类型信息。If the deleted node is a text node which is the content of a simple typed element, the element loses its type information. 这意味着，当定位在元素上，和属性具有值`null`，和分别。This means that when positioned on the element the , and properties have the values `null`, and respectively. - 已删除的节点是否仍可以访问定位在删除之前在它们的对象。Deleted nodes are still accessible to objects positioned over them prior to deletion. 但是，尝试将移开的已删除的子树的方法失败。However methods that attempt to move away from the deleted sub-tree fail. 例如，和方法始终失败时置于最已删除的顶级节点。For example, the and methods always fail when the is positioned over the top most deleted node. 这是因为已删除的节点不再连接到 XML 文档。This is because the deleted node is no longer connected to the XML document. 同样方法始终失败如果位于最底部的删除节点。Similarly the method always fails if the is positioned on the bottom-most deleted node. ## Examples 在下面的示例`price`的第一个元素`book`元素`contosoBooks.xml`使用删除文件方法。In the following example the `price` element of the first `book` element of the `contosoBooks.xml` file is deleted using the method. 在 元素删除之后，`price` 对象的位置位于父级的 `book` 元素上。The position of the object after the `price` element is deleted is on the parent `book` element. remarks.format: ## Remarks Namespace 前缀和 URI 值可以通过获取或方法。Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained using the or method. 例如，以下语法将插入一个同级元素使用的范围内命名空间`xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`:For example, the following syntax inserts a sibling element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ``` navigator.InsertElementAfter(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` 这将创建新的同级``元素。This creates the new sibling `` element. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果指定的命名空间前缀是`null`或，然后从当前命名空间范围内获取的命名空间 URI 的新元素的前缀。If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or , then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果没有分配给指定的命名空间 URI 在当前范围内命名空间前缀，则会自动生成的命名空间前缀。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated. - 方法是仅当位于元素、 文本、 处理指令或注释节点上。The method is valid only when the is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中的新`pages`之后插入元素`price`的第一个子元素`book`中的元素`contosoBooks.xml`文件。In the following example a new `pages` element is inserted after the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类以相反的文档顺序返回命名空间节点。The class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order. 因此， 实质上移到当前在范围内的最后一个命名空间节点。Therefore, essentially moves to the last namespace node in the current scope. 例如，使用以下 XML 片段，如果位于`data`节点，按以下方式的行为。Using the following XML fragment as an example, if the is positioned on the `data` node, behaves in the following manner. - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)` 将移动到以下命名空间节点之一： `xmlns:c='C'`， `xmlns:a='A2'`， `xmlns=''`， `xmlns:b='B'`，或`xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`。`MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, `xmlns:b='B'`, or `xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`. - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)` 将移动到以下命名空间节点之一： `xmlns:c='C'`， `xmlns:a='A2'`， `xmlns=''`，或`xmlns:b='B'`。`MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, or `xmlns:b='B'`. - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)` 将移动到`xmlns:c='C'`节点。`MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)` moves to the `xmlns:c='C'` node. ``` ``` 如果当前未定位在元素上，则此方法返回`false`和位置不会更改。If the is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false` and the position of the does not change. 后已移动到命名空间节点，属性反映命名空间的名称。After the has been moved to the namespace node, the property reflects the name of the namespace. 当位于命名空间节点，方法， ，和不适用。When the is positioned on a namespace node, the methods , , and are not applicable. 这些方法始终返回`false`，不会更改的位置。These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the . 相反，你可以调用可以移到下一步的命名空间节点。Rather, you can call to move to the next namespace node. 后定位在命名空间节点上，调用将移到元素节点。After the is positioned on an namespace node, call to move back to the element node. 有关命名空间节点的定义，请参阅 W3C XML 路径语言 (XPath) 建议的 5.4 节位于http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model。For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 预先计算的子节点的操作会将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的开头。Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果的元素有三个子节点，则预置的节点将成为第一个子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node. 如果不存在任何子节点，然后创建新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 新的子节点不会插入直到方法调用对象。The new child node is not inserted until the method of the object is called. - 方法是仅当定位在元素节点上。The method is valid only when the is positioned on an element node. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，新`pages`的子元素的第一个列表的开头预置`book`中的元素`contosoBooks.xml`文件使用从返回的对象方法。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is prepended to the beginning of the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object returned from the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所选内容的上下文是的位置当调用此方法。The context for the selection is the position of the when this method is called. 调用此方法后返回表示选定节点的集合。After calling this method, the returned represents the set of selected nodes. 使用方法要循环访问所选的节点集。Use method of the to iterate over the selected node set. 下面的 C# 代码循环访问所选节点集。The following C# code iterates over the selected set of nodes. ``` XPathNodeIterator iterator = nav.Select("/bookstore/book"); while (iterator.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(Iterator.Current.Name); } ``` 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 你仍可以使用任一对象的导航方法内移动。You can still use any of the object's navigation methods to move within the . 导航方法都是独立于在所选节点。The navigation methods are independent of the selected nodes in the . - 将来调用方法返回一个新指向所选的节点集相匹配的新对象调用。Future calls to the method return a new object that points to the selected set of nodes that matches the new call. 这两个对象是完全相互独立。The two objects are completely independent of each other. - 如果 XPath 表达式需要命名空间解析，则使用超负荷运转，此方法采用作为其自变量。If the XPath expression requires namespace resolution, use the overload, which takes an as its argument. - 此方法不起作用的状态。This method has no effect on the state of the . ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来选择节点集。The following example uses the method to select a node set. while (ni.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(ni.Current.Name); } ``` 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 你仍可以使用任一对象的导航方法内移动。You can still use any of the object's navigation methods to move within the . 导航方法都是独立于在所选节点。The navigation methods are independent of the selected nodes in the . - 将来调用方法返回一个新指向所选的节点集相匹配的新对象调用。Future calls to the method return a new object that points to the selected set of nodes that matches the new call. 这两个对象是完全相互独立。The two objects are completely independent of each other. - 如果需要命名空间解析，前缀和命名空间 URI 对必须添加到，和必须调用方法以指定要用于命名空间解析。If the requires namespace resolution, the prefix and namespace URI pair must be added to an , and the method must be called to specify the to use for namespace resolution. 例如，假定文档包含以下 XML 节点。For example, suppose the document contains the following XML nodes. ``` Pride And Prejudice ``` 下面的 C# 代码在这种情况下，选择`bk:ISBN`节点。In this case, the following C# code selects the `bk:ISBN` node. ``` XPathExpression expr = nav.Compile("book/@bk:ISBN"); XmlNamespaceManager mngr = new XmlNamespaceManager(new NameTable()); mngr.AddNamespace("bk","urn:samples"); expr.SetContext(mngr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果不包括前缀，则假定命名空间 URI 是空的命名空间。If the does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace URI is the empty namespace. 如果 XML 包含默认命名空间，你仍必须使用方法并提供，其中包含的前缀和命名空间 URI 以处理默认命名空间。If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the method and provide an that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace. 例如，假设有以下 XML。For example, suppose you have the following XML. ``` Pride And Prejudice ``` 在这种情况下，下面的 C# 代码选择所有书节点：In this case, the following C# code selects all book nodes: ``` XmlNamespaceManager nsmgr = new XmlNamespaceManager(nav.NameTable); nsmgr.AddNamespace("ab", "http://www.lucernepublishing.com"); XPathExpression expr; expr = nav.Compile("//ab:book"); expr.SetContext(nsmgr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` 此方法不起作用的状态。This method has no effect on the state of the . ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来选择节点集。The following example uses the method to select a node set. remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性和元素与原子的简单类型或简单文本内容属性返回一个装箱最合适的.NET framework 。For attributes and elements with atomic simple type or simple text content, the property returns a boxed of the most appropriate .NET Framework . 如果该元素或属性的内容是列表类型，属性返回的最合适的.NET framework 对象的数组。If the element or attribute's content is a list type, the property returns an array of objects of the most appropriate .NET Framework . 下表描述了每个返回的。The following table describes the returned by each . |XPathNodeTypeXPathNodeType|返回的 TypedValueTypedValue Returned| |-------------------|-------------------------| ||返回对象，其中包含所有节点后代中的文档中，连接在一起并由空格分隔。Returns a object containing all node descendants of the document, concatenated and separated by white space. 如果文档没有任何节点子级返回。If the document does not have any node children, is returned.| |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用属性实现后者提供了"虚拟化"XML 查看在存储区，以提供对基础对象的访问。The property can be used by implementations which provide a "virtualized" XML view over a store, to provide access to underlying objects. 例如，如果对象用于通过公共语言运行时 (CLR) 对象图中提供一个虚拟 XML 视图，你可能想要执行 XPath 查询使用方法，然后访问所选的节点的 CLR 对象。For example, if an object is used to provide a virtual XML view over a Common Language Runtime (CLR) object graph, you may wish to perform XPath queries using the method and then access the CLR objects underlying the selected nodes. 属性将公开这些基础对象。The property would expose these underlying objects. 在许多情况下，此值将为`null`，并返回的对象属性将始终为特定的实现。In many cases, this value will be `null`, and the object returned by the property will always be implementation specific. 属性应保留对象标识，仅应该用于返回到各自的重叠项存在一一对应的关系的对象。The property should preserve object identity and should only be used to return objects that have a one-to-one correspondence to their respective overlaid items. 用户应在同一个节点使用相同的连续访问上始终获得相同的对象对象或一个克隆。A user should always get the same object on successive visits to the same node using the same object or a cloned one. > [!NOTE] > 属性创建对象对象返回相应。The property of an object created by an object returns the corresponding .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有架构或类型信息 (例如，从对象使用 XML 架构验证初始化)，如果当前节点指 XML 架构和`xs:boolean`类型，属性返回当前节点的值作为取消装箱对象。If the has schema or type information (for example, from an object initialized with an XML schema validating ), and if the current node is defined as an XML Schema `xs:boolean` type, the property returns the current node's value as an unboxed object. 但是，如果不具有任何架构或类型信息，属性尝试将当前节点为字符串值转换值，根据 XPath 2.0 强制转换规则`xs:boolean`。However, if the does not have any schema or type information, the property attempts to convert the string value of the current node to a value, according to the XPath 2.0 casting rules for `xs:boolean`. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，在每个元素的值`valueas.xml`文件返回使用， ， ， ，和属性。In the following example, the value of each element in the `valueas.xml` file is returned using the , , , , and properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取.NET Framework的当前节点的类型化值。The property gets the .NET Framework of the typed value of the current node. 例如，类型的元素`xs:int`都的默认情况下。For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a of by default. 但是，可能是任何一种可以映射到有效类型`xs:int`如或。However, the could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int` such as or . 如果节点没有类型，这相当于节点的类型批注`xdt:untypedAtomic`。If a node has no type, this is equivalent to the type annotation on the node being `xdt:untypedAtomic`. 在这种情况下，属性返回节点的字符串。In this case, the property returns a string for the node. 有关详细信息，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md). ## Examples 在下面的示例中， `contosoBooks.xml` XML 文件和`contosoBooks.xsd`XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构用于创建对象。In the following example, the `contosoBooks.xml` XML file and `contosoBooks.xsd` XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema are used to create an object. 类型化的值`price`元素将显示使用属性，然后返回为字符串使用方法。The typed value of the `price` element is displayed using the property and then returned as a string using the method. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorProperties#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/CPP/xpathnavigatorproperties.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorProperties#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/CS/xpathnavigatorproperties.cs#6)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorProperties#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/VB/xpathnavigatorproperties.vb#6)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ``` 该示例还使用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 作为输入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. ```xml ```
